title.rendered: Dhaka University student’s at teacher’s father’s campus residence

content.rendered:
A university student daughter of a teacher committed ‘suicide’ in a residential area of ​​Dhaka University.

The name of the student is Adrita Binte Musharraf. He was studying in the first year of marketing department of Dhaka University. His father is the chairman of the management department of the university. Mosharraf Hossain.

Adrita was rescued early Sunday morning and taken to the emergency department of Dhaka Medical College Hospital. The doctor on duty declared him dead at 7:20 am.

Adritha lived with her parents in a building in the residential area of ​​the campus. University authorities say Adritha committed ‘suicide’.

Proctor of the university. Maksudur Rahman told Prothom Alo that it is known that Adrita committed suicide by hanging herself.

Hearing the cries of family members, an assistant proctor of the university went to the house around 4:30 in the morning. He goes there and hears that Adrita has committed suicide. But he could not find out any reason for it.

Adrita’s body has been sent to Dhaka Medical College morgue, hospital sources said.
